about-me.aboutme: Hello, I am a frontend developer from Werl, Germany. Driven by the endless possibilities of IT, I am passionate about creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications.
about-me.place: Flexible in my work environment, I can operate effectively both on-site in Werl and remotely.
about-me.bulb: I am open-minded and constantly seeking personal challenges to continuously expand my knowledge and enhance my skills.
about-me.puzzle: In my profession, programming is more than just writing code it's a creative approach to problem-solving. I take pride in transforming complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your vision to life.

skills.under-header: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skills.contact: Please feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.under-head: Discover a selection of my work here. Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.pokedex: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogs Pokémon information.
portfolio.polloloco: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
portfolio.join: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functional

contact.problem: Do you have a problem to solve?
contact.cnt-me: Please contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, learning about your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.need-me: Do you need a Frontend developer?
contact.privacyPolicy3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
